Title: Super Didi
Director: Hadrah Daeng Ratu, Adis Kayl Yurahmah
Actors: Vino G. Bastian, Karina Nadila, Ira Maya Sopha, Mathias Muchus
Plot: In two weeks absence of his wife, a young brilliant architect has to look after his two little girls as a clueless father. In the meantime he got a deadline of the most important project in his career.
